Archive_Schedule_Paragraph: Set the day and time for data archiving. It is recommended to choose a time during low business activity with Pepperi.
Archive_DeleteModal_Paragraph: Are you sure you want to delete this Activity from the data retention policy?
Archive_MissingActivityModal_Paragraph: Activity '{{Type}}' has been deleted from the system and will be removed
Archive_Policy_Paragraph: Number of months for the default data retention period for all activities. Define retention per activity below.
Archive_TypesModal_MinItemsDisclaimer: if the number of records from the data retention months defined are less than this number, additional records from previous months will be retained
Archive_TypesModal_MinItemsSectionTitle: Min records to retain per Account
Archive_TypesTable_NoItems: Click Add activity to define a data retention policy.
